translations: 种族混合；（尤指白人和非白人）异族通婚

sentences.sentence: The BNP says that it does not, nor will it ever, "accept miscegenation as moral or normal".
sentences.translation: 国家党称，该党现在不会，将来也不会“承认异族通婚是道德的和正常的”。

sentences.sentence: PS we've already gone through anti-miscegenation kinds of restrictions on marriage. -Yes.
sentences.translation: 而且，我们已经经历了“反对种族通婚法“这样的事，那是对于婚姻…

sentences.sentence: The mixing of RACES (or miscegenation) was usually considered as something to be avoided in the name of racial purity.
sentences.translation: 种族混合(或通婚)通常被认为是要避免的，以保持种族的纯度。
